attributes.title: HORRIBLE don’t buy this app!!!!!! 😡😡😡😡🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮
attributes.review:
Coming from a Chinese lesbian,

THIS IS A HORRIBLE APP 
Right when I opened the app it scammed me into buying a Trumpy bear!!! 😡😡😡😡
It said I was buying pop tarts in a special flavor when they scammed me into buying a Trumpy bear for $50!!!! Like wth!! 😡😡😡🤬🤬also every time I open the app it won’t let me touch ANYTHING but AT ANY OTHER APP I CAN TOUCH ANYTHING I WANT 
This app is so racist to me and homophobic 
DONT BUY

attributes.title: Slow
